title: Learn-Graphic-Design
description:
##############################
LEARN GRAPHIC DESIGN
##############################

Graphic Design goes way beyond graphic design software. Learn the theory behind design and how to apply it to real-life projects, earning your online degree

Are you tired of only finding Photoshop tutorials and no tutorial on design theory? Maybe you have no idea how to actually begin your design career? What do you really need to know? You don't know how to use color or typography? I might just have the right solution for you!

With my "Learn Real Graphic Design" online course, you'll be on your way towards becoming a real designer and finally get a graphic design job. If you've already seen my free graphic design course "Introduction to Graphic Design" on Udemy, you'll have a pretty good idea of what I teach in my courses.

This course covers information on a university level; we'll see all the steps in the most well known design process, all the design elements and design principles too! And we won't just see theory! There is also the practical side of it: how do you apply all of this information in your design projects? All explained in one helpful and complete course!


Video format: MP4
Resolution: 720p
Audio: Yes
